channel.title: Quick question
channel.description:
I can get people to use the freeze spells and it stops them from walking, but they can still click attack and move, im wondering how to get them to stay still for the specific amount of time.
Any suggestions?

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @epic_demic epic_demic
item.description:
@epic_demic wrote:

Newty:

In your attack method you need to add an ‘if statement’ at the beginning of it that checks if the player is frozen, and if he/she is frozen then they can’t attack.

thankyou for the help, ill check that now and post back if it works[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 28, 2009, 01:51:59 pm[/size][hr]k wait, is it the if(AttackingOn2.deathStage != 0 part? or somewhere else. Sorry for a nubby question lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

In your attack method you need to add an ‘if statement’ at the beginning of it that checks if the player is frozen, and if he/she is frozen then they can’t attack.

Read full topic
